scripts-info.ear [2:]server:debug: start server with hot-reload in debug mode (F5 to start debugging)
scripts-info.ear [2:]server:production: start server in Docker container (will be compiled)
scripts-info.ear [2:]test {test-suite-name}: only run tests matching test-suite-name, in watch mode
scripts-info.ear [2:]test:production: run all tests against server running in a Docker container
scripts-info.ear [2:]migrations:run 0: run all downgrade migration scripts (results in empty database)
scripts-info.ear [2:]migrations:run {target-version}: run migration scripts to targetted db schema version
scripts-info.ear [2:]migrations:reset: run all downgrade migration scripts, then all upgrade migration scripts
scripts-info.ear [2:]migrations:generate {migration-n: generate new migration based on differences in actual MySQL database schema and TypeORM entities (-entity.ts files)
scripts-info.ear [2:]api {model} {method} [-- --argum: invoke a faker call to generate a resource/dto for specified target-model (e.g. api company create)
scripts-info.ear gen-index {target-folder}: generate index.ts exporting all .ts files within target folder
scripts-info.ear test-url {target-url}: run all tests against a target URL (includes http and port)
